channel.title: Cannot load Crysis
channel.description:
When I try to load Crysis, the game asks me to enter a registration code. The problem is, when I type the registration code, the screen prompt simply pops back up asking for the registration code again.
EDIT: It seems to be affecting everyone who bought the Crysis Maximum Edition during EA week on Steam.
EDIT AGAIN: Those morons at EA finally got their affairs in order and fixed this game-breaking bug.

item.title: Cannot load Crysis
item.dc:creator: OrderOfDagon
item.description:
I laughed when I read the title lol.

Anyways, I had that problem with the demo I think.

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot load Crysis

item.description:
Crysis 2? Because thats totally happening to me on Crysis 2.

Read full topic
